```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
wt=read.csv("C:/Users/hchin/OneDrive/Atlantic Beach/Documents/PhD/DPhil/Yield_Gap_analysis/Yield_Gaps/Glasshouse/top_weight.csv")
attach(anthesis)
```

```{r}
lmod=lm(Simulated~Measured,wt)
summary(lmod)
```

```{r}
ggplot(wt,aes(Simulated,Measured))+
  geom_point(aes(colour = ))+
  geom_point(size=5, shape=17)+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",se=0)+
  theme_classic()+
  annotate("text",x=2000,y=2500,label="
           p value=0.03")+annotate("text",x=2500,y=2500,label="
           R-squared=0.71")
```
